## dhtSync variable

A utility function to wait until all conductors' integrated DhtOps are identical for a DNA.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dhtSync: (players: IPlayer[], dnaHash: DnaHash, interval?: number, timeout?: number) => Promise<void>
```
